title: Showtime: The 1980's LA Lakers
description:
Shukri reviews the book: Showtime: Magic, Kareem, Riley, and the Los Angeles Lakers Dynasty of the 1980's by Jeff Pearlman. The new HBO show, Winning Time, is based on the book, and in this podcast episode Shukri gives the listeners a compare and contrast.  

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/classxpodcast/message
